attributes.action: dissolve Parliament on the grounds that, having signed up to the Lisbon Treaty,there is no longer any need for a separate elected body to represent the wishes of the british people as the region known as Great Britain no longer exists as an autonomous state but is a satellite region of the European Community. This means the Uk Parliament is redundant as it no longer has a valid function and should therefore be eradicated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we no longer have the right to decide our own future so why should we need a parliament that serves no purpose apart from 'rubber stamping' EU directives!!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
